page.title: 14CUSTOMS IN CULWORTH-EVENTS 2
page.content: {STRAWBERRY FAYRE} Each Summer when the strawberries are ripe The W.I.of Culworth gather with the local population on the village green to eat cream/ strawberry teas,sell produce and play games.$169 was made in 1985 for W.I. funds. {HARVEST SUPPER}In the Autumn local people are invited to a Harvest Supper to celebrate the gathering of the Harvest usually in the church hall. {CHRISTMAS}Customs to celebrate this Christian Festival include parties at school,in the village hall,and a Nativity Play and Carol Service in church.Bell ringing takes place in the village with young and old joining together
